locations.name: Bedroom
locations.description: Your bedroom. Nicely decorated with lot's of plants everywhere.

locations.name: Hallway
locations.description: The hallway leads to the stairs in the west and east to the bathroom. To the north is your bedroom.

locations.name: Bathroom
locations.description: The bathroom is small, but everything is there. The sink is covered with your brushes and make-up.

locations.name: Stairway
locations.description: The stairway goes west down to the first floor, or east back into the hallway.

locations.name: Livingroom
locations.description: You're in your living room. You can go west up the stairs, south to the kitchen, east to the dining-room or north out the door.

locations.name: Dining room
locations.description: The dining room holds a diningtable with 6 chairs. You can go west to the livingroom.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: A small kitchen is all you need. You hardly cook anyway. You can go north to the livingroom or west to the garden.

locations.name: Garden
locations.description: The garden is small and simple, it just about gives you a sense of privacy. You can go east back into the kitchen.

locations.name: Porch
locations.description: You are on your porch, you can go north to the mall, east to the bar, south back into the house or west to go down town.

locations.name: mall
locations.description: The mall contains all your favorite shops.

locations.name: The blackwood bar
locations.description: it's a bar. You can go west back home
